abstract: FBI agents arrest Gregg R Mulholland during layover in Phoenix and charge him with masterminding $300 million penny-stock trading scheme and then laundering profits offshore; caps federal investigation that lasted more than two years.
lead_paragraph: A layover at a Phoenix airport gave the F.B.I. enough time to arrest Gregg R. Mulholland and charge him with overseeing the manipulation of penny stocks.

headline.main: A Layover Ends in Penny-Stock Scheme Arrest
headline.print_headline: Layover Ends in Penny-Stock Scheme Arrest

snippet: A layover at a Phoenix airport gave the F.B.I. enough time to arrest Gregg R. Mulholland and charge him with overseeing the manipulation of penny stocks.
